entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:22 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning late in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h.
